english.segment1: I broke everything we had. There's no fixing what went bad. So many fatal mistakes
english.segment2: I broke every single rule. And I don't think they've made a tool. To fix all my mistakes
english.segment3: When I said good bye. And brought a tear to your eye. That was my mistake
english.segment4: When I told you to go. Cause I just didn't know. That was my mistake
english.segment5: I broke down inside my mind. I thought that I was doing fine. I'm so hard on myself
english.segment6: I broke everything I built. And now I'm living with the guilt. At least I have my health
english.segment8: Time will heal, bruises fade. Life will change the plans we've made. If we face the truth and be our best. There's no need to worry about the rest
